summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FIESTA. WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC FOR A ROUTINE OIL CHANGE, THE TECHNICIAN STATED THAT THE TRANSMISSION WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE TECHNICIAN STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS UNSAFE TO DRIVE AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO TAKE THE VEHICLE TO A FORD DEALER TO HAVE THE SHUTTER SYSTEM INSPECTED. AFTER LEAVING THE INDEPENDENT MECHANIC AND DRIVING 35 MPH, THE CONTACT MADE A RIGHT TURN AND THE VEHICLE JERKED AND STALLED. THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO RESTART THE VEHICLE AND DROVE HOME. THE CONTACT MENTIONED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS SERVICED PER TSB: 14E08 TO HAVE THE POWERTRAIN CONTROL MODULE REPROGRAMMED AT FREEWAY FORD (9700 LYNDALE AVE S, BLOOMINGTON, MN 55420 (952) 888-9481). THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURES. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 52,000.
